about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm an advanced student of Information Systems Engineering and work as a Front-End Developer. I'm passionate about learning in technology and computing, always driven by my love for aesthetics and design, which I aim to reflect in every digital experience.
about.languages: Advanced English · Basic Italian, French and Portuguese

items.title: Front-End Developer
items.description: Development of a financial portal using React, TypeScript and user-focused design.

items.title: Retail Analyst / IT Support
items.description: Technology assistance and support in retail and management control processes for the group’s companies.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Feel free to reach out! I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations.
